name: Exodus!
description:
You play as a "test subject" and try to escape from the lab (with your friends!).

The game is still in very early development yet, but I will be posting the test version of the game,  and the beta version should be out by the end of this month.

#GamePlay

player 1: WASD to move, space to jump, j for the attack, l for interact, e for opening the addon menu.

#NOTICE: the multiplayer has a major bug right now so it has been currently disabled,  I will fix that soon.
